text:
People are creating ads with AI. 

Here's exactly how:

Axelle Malek made this 5-second video inspo ad for Amazon using Google Veo 3.

She used this prompt:

{
 "description": "Cinematic shot of a sun-drenched modern bedroom. A sealed Amazon Prime box with the smile logo quivers, bursts open, and flat-pack furniture pieces whirl together, transforming the space into a serene, styled room accented by an Amazon-orange throw on the bed. No text.",
 "style": "cinematic",
 "camera": "fixed wide angle",
 "lighting": "natural warm with cool accents",
 "room": "modern bedroom",
 "elements": [
  "Amazon Prime box (smile logo visible)",
  "bed with orange throw",
  "bedside tables",
  "lamps",
  "wardrobe",
  "shelves",
  "mirror",
  "art",
  "rug",
  "curtains",
  "reading chair",
  "plants"
 ],
 "motion": "box opens, furniture assembles precisely and rapidly",
 "ending": "calm, modern space with orange Amazon accent",
 "text": "none",
 "keywords": [
  "16:9",
  "Amazon",
  "Prime box",
  "modern",
  "fast assembly",
  "no text",
  "warm & cool tones"
 ]
}

1. Open Google Vids.
2. Click on 'Create New Video'.
3. Write your prompt.
4. Generate & edit it.

Teams can now go from idea to finished ad in minutes.
